ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two: A Rude Awakening
ComicInfo.Series: The Adventures of Augusta Wind: The Last Story
ComicInfo.Summary:
Trapped on the shadow-planet called Gloomworld, Augusta Wind and her friends find themselves face-to-face with the forces of Queen Mare. Will they escape her army of living nightmares and save the Storiverse—or will every tale ever told perish with them?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Vassilis Gogtzilas (a) & Carlos Badilla (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Vassilis Gogtzilas (a) & Carlos Badilla (c) | 2 | Note: The digital edition (9/14/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
